description.value:
Portable Stasis Field generators the shape of small armoured boxes up to large chests or sarcophagi. Time is near-halted inside a Stasis field once activated. These are Dark-Age Relics, incredibly durable and capable of remaining powered for eternity, keeping whatever is inside temporally disconnected from reality and in perfect condition.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: 25000 T
